title: 109_hr5950
content: Family Farm Energy Relief Act of 2006 - Repeals provisions of the Energy Policy Act of 2005 relating to: (1) the expensing of equipment used in refining of liquid fuels and accelerated depreciation of natural gas distribution and gathering lines. (2) the pass through of tax deductions for environmental compliance costs. (3) the small refiner exception to limitations on the oil depletion tax deduction. And (4) the two-year amortization of geological and geophysical expenditures. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain farmers actively engaged in farming: (1) a tax credit for 10 of farm diesel fuel expenses through 2009, (2) an increased agri-biodiesel producer tax credit, and (3) a small biodiesel producer tax credit.
